name: Pitaka Laxmi Venkata Naga Satya
education: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering, IIT Goa (2022–2026)

work.summary: Contributed to Varnika Designs by building responsive pages with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap; ensured cross-device compatibility and pixel-perfect UI; designed a custom display interface for large-screen restaurant outlet; collaborated in a team and adapted to evolving requirements.

projects.title: CPU Scheduling Simulator
projects.description: Web-based CPU Scheduling Simulator with visualization of FCFS, SJF (P/NP), LJF (P/NP), Priority (P/NP), Round Robin, and a Proposed Hybrid algorithm; includes Gantt chart, dynamic process management, and metrics (utilization, throughput, averages). Built with JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap; uses OOP patterns and async updates for preemptive scheduling.
